verses.text: O Christian, I-idle all the day! 'Tis not enough to wait and pray; O stand for duty, work for When sounds abroad the last great cry!
O work in earnest for the Lord And trust him for the great reward; Truth to thy task in-gathering lay! Lost, oh! so near thy sheltering ray!

The time is short, the labor great, O work for Jesus while you wait. And there for God the sick stand. And there for God the sick stand; 'Tis he who labors wins the prize, No idler ear gains the skies. The crown of life that was for thee.

chorus.text: Work and wait, work and wait, Eternity of rest is near. Work and wait, The time is short, the labor great; O work and wait till Christ appear. Work and wait till Christ appear.
